item.title: Deep Learning and Knowledge Representation
item.description: In “Deep Learning is Hitting A Wall,” Gary Marcus argues that deep learning is reaching its limits as a paradigm for artificial intelligence.

item.title: Short-Term COVID-19 Projections
item.description: On Wednesday, the WHO declared COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus, to be a global pandemic.
